Text: Downloaded your Photoshop CS6 torrent, installed and worked fine, downloaded Dreamweaver, installs but for some reason the updater gives me an error message, and will not install the update. Activated it with no problem at all ... The program runs, but I get "attempted an unsupported operation" when I try to create a new page or do other functions ... any ideas?

After a trip through Google, I discovered that the included update to 12.1 with "Creative Cloud" requires a 64 bit system, mine is 32 bit. Re-installed without the update and it works fine. Many thanks!
